subject: Playoff Games
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Braun’s two-run homer in the eighth off Bob Howry broke a tie and lifted the Brewers to victory and to the playoffs for the first time in 26 years.
snippet: Ryan Braun’s two-run homer in the eighth off Bob Howry broke a tie and lifted the Brewers to victory and to the playoffs for the first time in 26 years.
